SELECT * FROM videos
AND type = ( SELECT id FROM category WHERE category_name = #{movieType} )
AND id IN ( SELECT video_category.video_id FROM video_category LEFT JOIN category ON category.id = video_category.category_id WHERE category.category_name = #{movieSubType} )
AND location_id = ( SELECT video_location.location_id FROM video_location WHERE location_name = #{movieRegion} )
AND publish_date = #{movieAging}
LIMIT 30
OFFSET #{targetOffset, jdbcType=INTEGER,typeHandler=com.video_master.video_master_backend.util.StringToIntegerHandler}

SELECT count(id) FROM videos
AND type = ( SELECT id FROM category WHERE category_name = #{movieType} )
AND id IN ( SELECT video_category.video_id FROM video_category LEFT JOIN category ON category.id = video_category.category_id WHERE category.category_name = #{movieSubType} )
AND location_id = ( SELECT video_location.location_id FROM video_location WHERE location_name = #{movieRegion} )
AND publish_date = #{movieAging}

select videos.id, videos.`NAME`, videos.starring, videos.img_src,video_palys_number.plays_number from videos left join video_palys_number on videos.id = video_palys_number.video_id
AND videos.`NAME` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchedKeyWords}, '%')
AND type = ( SELECT id FROM category WHERE category_name = #{movieType} )
order by
video_palys_number.plays_number desc
videos.publish_date asc
videos.id desc
LIMIT 30
OFFSET #{targetOffset, jdbcType=INTEGER, typeHandler=com.video_master.video_master_backend.util.StringToIntegerHandler}
